research.vision: Pioneering sustainable circuits and systems: carbon-aware co-optimization, carbon-aware computing, and energy-efficient methodologies for power- and energy-limited applications spanning solid-state circuits, architectures, and systems.

thrusts.title: System / Architecture & Platform
bullets: SoC/SiP architectures and platforms for IoT, AI, and communication applications
Hierarchical configurable interconnect with 3D-SRAM for memory-centric computing
Memory subsystems for heterogeneous multi-core SoC/SiP
Accelerator-rich and memory-rich architectures for domain-specific computing
System-level power analysis and noise reduction in HPC/3DIC
Accelerator/reconfigurable architectures for SDR and resilient wireless networks

thrusts.title: Circuit / Technology Co-Design
bullets: Circuit/technology co-design using monolithic/TSV 3DIC and emerging memories/devices
Low-power, high-density embedded memories and diagnosis (SRAM, RF, FIFO, CAM/TCAM)
Computation-in-memory and in-memory search for neural networks (SRAM, ReRAM, FeFET, FeRAM)
Energy-efficient digital VLSI using emerging memories/devices
Power management and data communication for 3D-IC (M3D & TSV 3D-IC)
Ultra-low-voltage IC design for IoT and biomedical applications
